website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful top-of-the-line option that also produces ozone.
pros: Includes ozone production, HEPA filter, activated carbon filter, Photocatalytic filter, and UV lamp
ft., so it is great for large spaces
cons: Should not be generating ozone while people are at home

customer_reviews.title: Second try and still a bitter disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had borrowed a friends ozone generator, thought it was exactly like this one so when I had to return it, I bought this one. After a very short time the "ozone" function wasnt working so I ordered another one just like it. It too quit working in that function soon after I received it. Not sure if these are "refurbished" or just my unlucky luck??? I'm very disappointed because I love both the functions these offer....when they work
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Place it up high
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of environmental allergies and this air purifier is one of the best I've ever used. Fifteen years ago I sold a similar item as a dealer but they cost $600.00. I do recommend the machine be placed as high as possible to efficiently remove particles in the air from the ceiling down, as this is how the needle point ionization works ( I noticed that the picture in the box has the purifier sitting on the floor.) The needle point acts like pine trees in a Forrest to remove heavy air particles. I was also very please at how fast it arrived once I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Unit DOES clean the air.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a chronic cough which no doctor to date has been able to analyze or altar. Someone suggested an air purifier and ozone generator. We ordered two one of the living room and one for the bed room. We've had them for well over a month. Dust is noticeably down my wife coughs less. The unit arrives without the filters installed, but with easy to follow instructions. It is a well designed device; as well as, sturdily constructed. We're happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wrenches

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders, a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this purifier for several months. We live in Arizona and our property is on an unpaved road. My wife suffers from asthma and we both have allergies. She was having a particularly difficult time with the asthma when we ordered this unit. Almost immediately it made a difference for her. I was a little bit hesitant after reading some of the reviews related to the ozone output. However, we simply followed the instructions that came with the unit, and it is working fine. Neither our dog nor our cat have had any issues. When we walk into the house, it truly is a breath of fresh air. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: CPABOB

customer_reviews.title: HEPA filter is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Ionizer and ozone generator works great. HEPA filter is useless. Filter doesn't seal to housing and fan doesn't draw enough cfm.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Unanswered  Questions
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and have tons of questions!!! I'd like to know where that filter - the one known as a ceramic plate - goes. There are 3 with them and I can't see where they go I don't know where they go. WHERE DO THEY GO?? Don't I need one to operate it?? I haVe to say it is the WORST OWNERS MANUAL i HAVE EVER SEEN!! PRETTY CLOSE UP THERE TO USELESS. At this point I'd rather go bsck yo my olf EcoQuest!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Fresh air!
customer_reviews.text: This air sanitizer works really well. I live with a smoker and the air actually is greatly improved. I had another type cleaner but just could not get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: patricia boyers-brogle

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money and Too Many Issues
customer_reviews.text: 1) Noise level above the lowest setting of 1 or 2 is unacceptable 2) Printed instructions included are so faintly printed as to be unreadable 3) Strick warning given to users about not using the Ozone generator if people are present (say what ?) 4) Over priced for what you get 5) Doesn't work as good as my 10 year old Hunter air cleaner-ozone machine 6) Giving off a very odd smell like storage mothballs (and no its not the ozone or ionized air) 7) Product is too heavy 8) Sending it back to Amazon ASAP 9) Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Illinois Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: I live in UN-airconditioned home in a narrow valley beside a river. LOTS of humidity in the summer. I used this purifier in a mostly unused wing of the house - about 500 sq ft. I ran the unit for 60 - 90 minutes a day and it worked GREAT. The musty smell was gone and mold growth vastly inhibited. After almost a month, the O3 generator switch stopped working completely. Nothing happened when I turned it on. Thanks to Amazon Prime policy, my return and refund was easy and complete. I gave it one star because the product only worked for 3 weeks. Had I rated it on week 2, it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Reacquainted love
customer_reviews.text: I had aion ozone machine 15 years ago. Loved it than, and plugged this one in and immediately fell in love again. It smells fresh, no more sprays to try to freshen the air. As it time to close up the house, its a perfect time to get it. Cleaning is just as I remembered. Thank you. Just wish it was lighter in weight.. last one fell on my head when I was replacing it on the shelf. . . . . . Will be more carefully with this one. );
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A little noisey on high but it Works!
customer_reviews.text: I recently found out that this air purifier is actually working. After a week of use the house didn't smell any different to me. Then I got two new puppies. I set wee wee pads out for them at night. First morning, yes, they used the pads but boy did the house smell of poop! The next night I put the air purifier on high before I went to bed. Woke up and there was no smell. I thought, wow, the puppies must of held it all night but I was wrong. Upon closer inspection, there was poop but no smell!! This machine is doing it's job ;)
customer_reviews.author: GOK

customer_reviews.title: Clean Air!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit as a result of northwest fires. Works like a champ! Had 18 years experience with the older model in school facilities maintenance using the ionic science to take away odors and freshen spaces. I have many allergies and the short use of the machine cleans my house air quickly and effectively! Excellent product!! *My advice to you is to read about about the science before purchasing the product. There are a couple schools of thought about using these machines especially if you have breathing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy J

customer_reviews.title: Parts were missing
customer_reviews.text: the machine would only operate at 25% of capacity. I had to do each room with the door closed; still didn't get out all of the odors. I missed the deadline to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Gets the job done for 1200 sf
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Except it is loud. I dream of a silent one. I understand it has to move air through it, but someone will figure out how to blend a blameless fan (Dyson) with the photocatalytic, UV, O3, HEPA combo one day. If I wan't a renter I'd install a whole house system in my air handler. But of course, there are days when your air handler isn't required. Just make sure your windows are open. Houses are designed terribly. The USGBC.org and LEED rating systems address indoor air quality. Don't settle for a developer home. They DO NOT care about indoor air quality. Get a LEED consultant.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shlifer

customer_reviews.title: Best ozone and filtration on the market
customer_reviews.text: If you have any odor issue in your home, including pet odors, these units will sanitize your air and people will notice the difference. I am very pleased with this purchase. Easy to use and durable. I have owned these ozone type units before. Look no further. This is the one to buy. Best value after thorough research. I have noticed less dust buildup in our home since using two of these on opposite ends of our home. I like to sleep with white noise and this unit provides a pleasant sound to sleep to in addition to doing the job it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the Air
customer_reviews.text: So far we're satisfied with this air cleaner. It seems to provide our living area air with a freshness. We aer concerned about the ozone generator after reading several articles about the dangers of ozone to lungs and breathing. We've only had it on occasionally as a result. We've contacted both the vendor and the manufacturer for clarification of the ozone setting and, unfortunately, have received no resonse to date from either.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This unit stopped producing ozone 1 day after I purchased it. Don’t waste your money. Called their support and they told me it was working but that it would not be noticeable. The cabinet is nice and it looks well made but that won’t get you ozone in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: No more Cat or Dog Odors !
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have cats & dogs that are both indoor & outdoor. Have always did my best to keep litter boxes cleaned (morning & evening) , but still an odor. The Ivation 5 in 1 HEPA filter does the trick. Now I can invite friends over without being concerned about "stinky odors" in my house! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Fredomm

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This type of device has been around for 30 years. Although I don't know if it's was the same manufacturer, it certainly reminds me of the exact same unit. It does what it says. It's easy to use and exactly what I was expecting. I'm so glad I finally decided to buy it. The filtering and UV light gives me some comfort that it's cleaning the air
customer_reviews.author: Programmer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and does not provide high level ozone
customer_reviews.text: The device looks beautiful, like a good piece of a living room furniture. The output is actually so low that for the COVID-19 being eliminated it has to run continuously but the person can not be in the room at that time and some time after. For the fraction of its price, you can buy a professional device, which produces 10 times more ozone and can be easily moved to different locations. I ended up returning this beautiful impractical device and buying another one for less than $100 and use it in many locations from the basement to the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Smoking
customer_reviews.text: This Air purifier is a little small. But it does a heckuva job. I broke my hip and I couldn’t go outside to smoke. So I bought one for my room and you would never know I had smoked a cigarette. I love this machine. But don’t smoke LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase made as a donation to a family that is living through the West Coast fires. They received it and absolutely love it. It is helping tremendously. I highly recommend. I love Amazon too :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this purifier for pet odors in carpet. You do have to "blast" strong odors by turning machine on high, close doors, and leave window cracked for ventilation. But after a few treatments, the smells went away. We keep it on low to keep the house smelling fresh. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: works ok. do not like that there is no timer for setting. manual and where can I get filters?
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good company!
customer_reviews.text: the first one I ordered had a broken corner. They were extremely quick in responding and had another on the way within minutes. Very impressed! The new one just arrived and it's perfect. Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pursley

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I've had air purifiers with ionizers for at least 10 years that cost 4x as much. This unit was easy to operate out of the box. The ozone (clean fresh weather) smell was evident immediately. I run the unit 24/7 and have had no issues so far. I did purchase the extended warranty just in case. Happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged in shipping. Amazon Replacing immediately. The product still works exceptionally well. I used to sell a similar product, at 4 time the price. This unit exceeds my hopes and expectations. In fact only one of the 3 ceramic plates is needed for my 1825 sq. ft. home.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to reduce viruses and dust and odors. I believe its working on all levels. Our relatives are sick but we're not. Very little dust in the air and the air feels really fresh. The unit is very quiet even on full power. We're using for a 14wX80 feet mobile home. Does the whole place on medium power and have the ion set on low.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit!
customer_reviews.text: this product is great! Works well to get kitchen smells out of the house, like tacos and deep fried foods
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removes stale smoke odor!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! I live with a smoker and while he doesn’t smoke in the house a lot, he does sometimes. It has pulled the stale odor out and replace with a much cleaner smell! I would like to know how often to clean and or replace the filters though. The instructions do not cover that at all. Highly recommend this air purification system!
customer_reviews.author: Bedelia y. Gascho

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for house use
customer_reviews.text: They have ceramic tile in those if used on high seems very toxic will make you choke
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 days of receiving it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product back on Dec. 20, 2019 .... it was delivered on December 23, 2019... today on December 25, 2019 the Ozone stopped working. Up until now it was working fine. Will be returning it for a replacement.. if the replacement stops working then I will return for a refund and won't buy it again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cute & Cuddlie A.W.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent investment, easy to operate, purchased a timer to allow ozone to operate while room is unoccupied, low noise, attractive wood finish, low tech on the outside and robust electronics on the inside. Couldn’t be more pleased. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: WVPatriot

customer_reviews.title: I love that clean air scent
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the previous model, on the outside. BUT it has 3 plates instead of 2, a several intake air filters. Love that clean air smell and way to kill airborne threats. I Expect to be very happy as long as I regularly maintain as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Merced

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: this is our 2nd unit. best one for the price. cleans the air and no funky smells, just fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: isolde

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: The ozone generator portion of this stopped working in less than a month. Poor quality. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had a couple clients who used this purifier and I always liked how clean their house smelled. It reminds me of a early spring morning. It's a mixed reviews from my kids. One really likes it, one says it's okay and the other doesn't. I'm definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly effective at removing odors
customer_reviews.text: We have used one of these over the years and find them to be so effective in removing any undesirable odors from cooking, etc There is a strong ozone odor IF you turn that feature on high but you have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Harmann

customer_reviews.title: Have horrible allergies here.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use plugins, candles and anything else to try and cover up Dog smells from one loveable dog. This machine is magic. I breathe so much better and without fake chemical smells anymore. I used to be the person that would over scent myself with cologne, sprays and deoderants. Now this magic machine has changed my life. : )
customer_reviews.author: bdf123789

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: The hepa filter is first in front to the metal electrostatic filter and activated charcoal filter. So it's going to fill up with large particles that would normally be picked up by the washable metal filter. So I expect to be buying a lot of disposable hepa filters.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping Dog

customer_reviews.title: Super Value, super product!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely great! I have seen them for four times the money and I've always wanted one. It does make the air a little tart to the nose if you've never used one before. But I think with the viruses, colds, flu Oh, and the coronavirus this is something I'm very happy to have in my Arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: TONY D.

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifyer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have bought 2, but they were being discontinued and 1 is all that I could get. The air I breath in my apartment is NOTICEABLY cleaner! A really good investment for an airpurifyier!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Get crisp mountain air in a house with pets & kids!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleaner for bad allergies! Have not used O3 generator yet as there’s always a person or pet in the area. The “regular” cleaning section has done a great job of eliminating smells from pets & food cooking. Air inside house is now noticeably crisper and cleaner feeling, if that makes sense. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: BowerPower

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for clean air in our home. We have a 2200 sq ft home and it is perfect for that. Easy to use and not too loud when the fan is turned on. Clean clean air!
customer_reviews.author: christopher nicola morabito

customer_reviews.title: It died.  Way too expensive for the am't of time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Feb 2019 and used it regularly for a month on a home that I was rehabbing. I used it again in Dec. 2019 and after a few days off and on, it died Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 days.  Got a replacement and it never worked at all.
customer_reviews.text: Basically the switch for the fan on the Left HEPA Filter side would no longer turn on. The switch on the right side turned the fan on but ran the ozone. So essentially it is only a switch, but a very important thing to not work. The fact that two in a row completely failed is a major problem and I would not order these under any circumstances unless they address this specific issue directly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Our first one we had for a few yrs and it broke so we just ordered another and its great as ever, our air never feels as good as it does with this baby lol
customer_reviews.author: Cailin Steeves

customer_reviews.title: UV LIGHT DANGER?
customer_reviews.text: cleans air, BUT you can see the UV LIGHT though the grill. Dangerous!?
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Warren

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: So... I think if you need this for certain things it will work as needed however.... it gave me headaches and it smelled nasty to me. I refunded it.
customer_reviews.author: Lives4trauma

customer_reviews.title: Best house refresher
customer_reviews.text: Our house air and feel has improved so much since getting the ionizer. Big decrease in mold and dust. Breathing much better. Smell all around is way fresher. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraB

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I can usually see dust particles floating in the sun rays coming through my upstairs window. Not anymore, just two days after receiving and using this unit, all dust particles are gine. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Ozone Smell
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this air purifier a little over a week and are very pleased with the fresh, clean smell in the house. It’s nice to know that this should help cut down on dust and allergens in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: No Worries here
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these over the years and this is the BEST one I have had. The 3 plates makes a big difference and the multiple filters really helps too. Allergy problem is all but gone while I am in the house. Thank you for a Great product at a Great price and the lightning fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Tate

customer_reviews.title: It’s cleared up the musty smell in my basement with an hours.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. It’s cleared up the musty smell in my basement with an hours.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value and priduct
customer_reviews.text: With everything going on in the world today, I am glad I bought this. It started out as a nice to have for my husband's health, to a great to have for the whole family! Works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months, keeps blowing fuses.
customer_reviews.text: It was the only product available at the time. It came reeking of paint fumes, it's not intuitive to set up, doesn't have instructions. And now it doesn't work. I'd buy another brand next time
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works well
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this air purifier. Air is much better in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: MKP2282

customer_reviews.title: Loud and rattles
customer_reviews.text: Unit rattles really bad. Fan is also loud. Will be replacing with a winix unit.
customer_reviews.author: rprvw

customer_reviews.title: Powerful unit!
customer_reviews.text: This unit does what it says, very powerful. We have an older home with a damp smelling crawl space below. This takes care of the odor that can permeate the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in the presence of humans or animals
customer_reviews.text: I was misinformed in the description of the product. When I got the instructions and the product it said that it can not be used in the presence of children or animals for at least one hour after using. I was under the impression from the description that it would clear the air and it said nothing about nobody Present while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Without question this product works great. Very quite operation with no negative comments to report. Highly recommended. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with air cleaner. It's not noisy and I can't tell there is a smoker in the house anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one I have bought. Best product. Small and works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Eugenie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produt
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purifier I've had. The first one was a different company and was excellent. Lasted a very long time and is no longer manufactured. I purchased the Ivation and am pleased as it has much of the same settings/features as my old one. Amazon Seller - DBROTH was prompt and item arrived very secure. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: siri

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: it works amazing to remove smoke smell damage from items
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Morris

customer_reviews.title: good air cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Using this to clean the air in a rental house, and it is working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of odors quickly and quietly. We love the product excellent value .
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Purifier!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I like the UV light option with the HEPA & Charcoal filter. This unit has three ozone plates compared to most that have one. This is a very nice machine and ozone function works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well built and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Solid construction. Strong performance as ozone generator and air purifier. Shipped much earlier than promised. I noticed they are now out of stock. We all know why but when they are available again highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Yonker

customer_reviews.title: Clean Air
customer_reviews.text: A perfect air filter, just a little pricey, but happy! Thanx :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shade

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to have the fan draw more air and actually ...
customer_reviews.text: No more smelling the cat litter boxes! The smells are completely gone. I'd like to have the fan draw more air and actually help with filtering but I really purchased it for getting rid of the litter box smells.
customer_reviews.author: matthew michalec

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine For Pet Owners
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple dogs and this machine does a good job of keeping the room smelling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely effective but California has banned ozone machines. Do your homework know what you’re bringing into your home. Bad for your lungs, pets and plants.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it... I leave it on 24/7 & it works wonderfully! I even bought another for my brother’s home
customer_reviews.author: Luli930

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to clear paint fumes out of my home and it did the job?
customer_reviews.author: Kim McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So pleased bought a second unit for another house! Three plates instead of two
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Viola

customer_reviews.title: Small and unobtrusive, very powerful, works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, filter, air cleaner. Small but powerful. Removes bad smells in the air quick.
customer_reviews.author: LCMWAW

customer_reviews.title: Clean Air at times like these!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this air cleaner for our therapy clinic. It is easy to set up and works like a charm. On the second day a patient came into our office and immediately said, "You have a HEPA filter here don't you?" Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bowe

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ionizer control knob only turns ON at 4th speed dot/section. Ozonator control knob only turns ON at 3rd speed dot/section. Heavy. Manual instructions not very useful. does not include spare fuse, which must be included.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty

customer_reviews.title: No Power Cord included
customer_reviews.text: Came without a power cord. Having been trying to get one shipped from Ivation for about a week now without success.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's great, but could use a timer for the ozone feature. I had to get a timer plug in, so I could leave it running without being in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cuda

customer_reviews.title: A must have for smokers and pet owners
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the house smelling better and filters the air. We smoke and have dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Warcon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and our family loves it including our family boxer (who has allergies).
customer_reviews.author: mark mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my dad to use in his camper and he received it broken. He was able to repair parts but the fan does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product looks great and does what thg it says
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Vidaurre

customer_reviews.title: Odor killer
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Kills odors faster than any spray. I did have a problem with the first one we bought but it was quickly replaced. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of science and tech for your health
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing - could tell the difference in air quality in less than an hour from plugging it in for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: DrGrace

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, mine broke after only a month or so, for no reason whatsoever. I didn’t even use it much and put no pressure on it at all. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: stahlk12

customer_reviews.title: Smoke
customer_reviews.text: House had been smoked in... the smoke smell is GONE ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Hester Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, works good. Reduced the smoke smell. *****
customer_reviews.author: Lady blue dragon

customer_reviews.title: Paint and floor stain
customer_reviews.text: Hardwood floors have been refinished. Air purifier did not help at all. Would never buy for paint or stain orders or fumes. Would not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Godsend

product_meta.title: Ivation 5-in-1 HEPA Air Purifier & Ozone Generator, Ionizer & Deodorizer for Up to 3,700 Sq/Ft – Included HEPA, Carbon and Photocatalytic Filters, with UV Light and Negative Ion Generator
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE AIR PURIFIER – item IVAOZAP04 Cleans, Freshens, Filters & Eliminates Dust & Airborne Contaminants for a More Comfortable Breathing Experience in Home or Office
POWERFUL OZONE GENERATOR – Electrical Charge Converts Oxygen to Ozone for Clean-Smelling Effect; Removes Odors Caused by Smoke, Pets, Food, Paint, Etc.
NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY – Releases Positively Charged Particles to Minimize Dust, Dander, Mold Spores, Pollen & Other Common Indoor Allergens & Pollutants
5-IN-1 AIR FILTRATION – Multilayer Design Delivers Max Purification; Ozonator, HEPA Filter, Activated Carbon Filter, Photocatalytic Filter & Ultraviolet Germicidal Lamp
EASY TO CLEAN & OPERATE – Unit Features Beautiful Cherry Wood Exterior, Removable Fan Grill & Control Knobs to Adjust Ozonator & Ionizer/UV/Fan Speed
